description: Create a new header component with drawer navigation that slides in from the left. Include navigation items for Home, New Page, and Settings. Create a Settings page with dark mode toggle.
goal: Replace the current header with a modern drawer-based navigation system that provides better UX and organization of navigation items and settings.
requirements: Drawer navigation slides in from left
Navigation items: Home (/), New Page (/new-page), Settings (/settings)
Settings page contains dark mode toggle
Drawer trigger button in top left of header
Drawer can be opened/closed with animation
Header remains visible when drawer is open
Responsive design works on mobile and desktop
constraints: Dark mode toggle must be moved from current Header to Settings page
Drawer should not interfere with existing page layouts
Must work in both Electron and browser environments
